details: The script appears to be a performance benchmark for LULESH, a hydrodynamics code used in simulating high-energy physics problems.
It utilizes MPI for parallel execution across multiple nodes.
The script employs CUDA for GPU acceleration.
The script runs different configurations of LULESH with varying grid sizes and tile sizes.
It uses jsrun to launch the LULESH executable with specific resource allocation parameters.
The script performs multiple runs for each configuration and logs performance metrics.
The script relies on modules for managing software dependencies.
The script modifies environment variables for library path and job management.
